vulnerabilities.description: Using v-html can lead to XSS vulnerabilities if not properly sanitized
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Avoid using v-html with user-provided content. If necessary, sanitize the content using a library like DOMPurify.

context.content: <!-- XSS vulnerability: Using v-html with user input -->

vulnerabilities.recommendation: Ensure interpolated values are properly sanitized before rendering.

vulnerabilities.description: Using eval() can lead to code injection vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Avoid using eval(). Use safer alternatives like JSON.parse() for parsing JSON.

vulnerabilities.description: Vue router usage with potential security concern
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Validate and sanitize route parameters and destinations to prevent open redirects and parameter pollution.
